nodes.text: The Crystal Eater was the name given to a guid living on Ilum in 3640 BBY, when it was killed.

The Crystal Eater appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Ilum. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
